title: NightRenew Retinol Serum
description: A premium 0.5% Retinol formulation designed for Normal, Dry, Mature skin types.
key_benefits: Retinol works to reduce the appearance of fine lines.
Ceramides support skin barrier function for anti-aging.
Retinol contributes to an anti-aging effect.
Ceramides help skin appear smoother and reduce fine lines.
